description.narrative: The project will initiate reform through a rights-based, local democracy model that aims to strengthen voice channels between claimholders (citizens), and duty-bearers (government).

activity-description.narrative: 1: Citizen mechanisms to ensure voice and participation in democratic processes established. 2: Foundations for political reforms strengthened and advocated.
1: Citizen mechanisms to ensure voice and participation in democratic processes established. 2: Foundations for political reforms strengthened and advocated.
